hero.title: Streamline Your Photo Proofing Workflow
hero.subtitle: Upload photos, collaborate with clients, manage reviews, and deliver final images with our intuitive photo proofing platform

errors.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL (starting with http:// or https://)

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to streamline your photo proofing workflow from upload to delivery

workflow.title: Streamlined Workflow
workflow.description: Upload photos, let clients select their favorites, and manage the entire editing and review process in one seamless platform.

review.title: Client Collaboration
review.description: Clients can select photos, add comments, and review edited versions. Collaborate effectively with clear feedback and approval workflows.

versionControl.title: Version Management
versionControl.description: Track original and edited versions of each photo. Clients can compare versions and approve final images with confidence.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works best for you. Upgrade or downgrade anytime.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join photographers and studios who are streamlining their photo proofing workflow. Sign up today and start managing your projects with ease.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe to get updates on new features
